author: Smcalman
text: Horrible experience. Ordered sneakers for my daughter on march 30 and don’t receive until April 14. Whoever was the seller took six business days to ship. Never using StockX again first and last. I will stick with GOAT.
title: Horrible experience

author: Greg
text: I ordered the right size. The shoes I received are not the right size and now they don’t accept returns! A real joke!
title: I ordered the right size

author: Li
text: Horrible experience, received the completely wrong item and costumer service is barely doing anything about it
title: Scam

author: Jae
text: Trash don't shop here
title: Trash

author: Jacqueline
text: You ruined my grandson’s birthday with your delays. It seems to me if someone is paying the full price for the sneakers you should be making every attempt and going above and beyond to assure their delivery dates that are initially quoted. I will never order on the site again
title: You ruined my grandson’s birthday with…

author: Mohamed
text: It has been 12 days since the order and it hasn’t even been received by stockx, customer service confirmed it’s on its way and will arrive in yet another week.
title: It has been 12 days since the order and…

author: Jill
text: This has been a complete disaster. The two items I purchased were from out of the country and stock x did not provide any of the information needed for customs. It has been delay after delay sending information to dhl that I have no information on. I will never purchase again w stock x for anything out of the country if at all
title: This has been a complete disaster

author: isaiah
text: they said my shoes get to my house yesterday and they’re still not here
title: they said my shoes get to my house…

author: Mason
text: It’s been almost a week since stockx was shipped my order from the buyer and I have had no update.
title: It’s been almost a week since stockx…

author: euan
text: Didn’t get refunded
title: Didn’t get refunded

author: Simone
text: My Yeezy 700 had loose thread all over which leads me to believe that I did not receive a authentic pair
title: My Yeezy 700 had loose thread all over…

author: Aishah
text: Still haven’t received shoes
title: Still haven’t received shoes

author: Corey
text: I didn’t receive my order yet
title: I didn’t receive my order yet

author: Megan
text: I’m still waiting on my package it’s been a month wondering how I can get some kind of update
title: I’m still waiting on my package it’s…

author: teri
text: bad tracking service
title: to many delay’s

author: James
text: Looked like box was opened, stuff was loose in box. Each pack felt the same like I was getting the same cards, only pulled 1 minor hit.
title: Looked like box had been opened

author: Michael
text: Impossible to track my order. Said that I didn't have an account, tried to make one, said an account already existed, tried to reset my password, said I didn't have an account. Wash, rinse, repeat. I still haven't been notified yet by stockx that they my item was shipped but FedEx contacted me 4 days ago to let me know that a delivery is coming tomorrow. You would think that all these hidden fees that you don't see until checkout would result in a better experience.
title: Impossible to track my order

author: Sanj Mar
text: Fakes not worth it
title: Fakes

author: Ghali
text: I never received the shoes
title: I never received the shoes

author: Quentin
text: I never received the product I purchased
title: I never received the product I purchased
